name: Berthier A. Ribeiro-Neto
content: Berthier Ribeiro-Neto Berthier Ribeiro-Neto is an Associate Professor at the Department of Computer Science of the Federal University of Minas Gerais, currently on a part-time assignment. He is also a Director of Engineering and Site Lead at the Google Research and Development Center, located in Belo Horizonte. His research interests include information retrieval (IR), Web systems, and digital libraries. Modern Information Retrieval---The Concepts and Technology behind Search. Ricardo Baeza-Yates & Berthier Ribeiro-Neto. 2nd Edition, Pearson, 2011. 2012 ASIS&T Book of the Year Publications as recorded at DBLP Profile at Google Scholar Short biography Students Information Retrieval---Search Engines in the Web 2018
